Weekly.title: Gathering for practitioners
Weekly.description: Discuss your past week with the VRM community, in terms of personal development, spiritual study/practice, and share relevant resources.

Weekly.title: Community hangout
Weekly.description: A casual hangout witn no set topic. Bring your own or come to say hello!

Weekly.title: 'Mindfulness of Breathing' Group Meditation
Weekly.description: Buddhist 'Mindfulness of Breathing' meditation in group setting. Practice and discuss together, or learn from an instructor!

Weekly.title: Hermetic Qabalah Study Groups
Weekly.description: Discuss Hermetic Qabalah literature with the study group, under guidance of a host.

Special.title: Knowledge and Discernment in Spirituality
Special.description: An exploration into the enigmatic Enochian language, and the important yet unexplored Liber Logaeth.

Special.title: Agrippa's Third Book of Occult Philosophy, condensed
Special.description: Part 3/3 in this series where occultist Dave the Amateur Magus breaks down Agrippa's foundational works on occult philosophy.
